subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Stacy Lewis moved a step closer to her second straight victory on the L.P.G.A. Tour by beating Sandra Gal, 4 and 3, in the second round of the Sybase Match Play Championship in Gladstone, N.J.
snippet: Stacy Lewis moved a step closer to her second straight victory on the L.P.G.A. Tour by beating Sandra Gal, 4 and 3, in the second round of the Sybase Match Play Championship in Gladstone, N.J.
